### About me

<p>

I am a **postdoctoral researcher** at the **University of California, Berkeley**, affiliated with the Center for Effective Global Action (**CEGA**).

I hold a Ph.D. in Economics from Tilburg University where I am affiliated with the Experimental Economists at Tilburg.
